oembed.html:
From Brad Pitt's message for "single" Britain, to crying mums - here are the highlights from the 2020 #Baftas https://t.co/uYu7YY476r pic.twitter.com/66Za5wGsFN

— BBC News (World) (@BBCWorld) February 3, 2020

oembed.title: 1917 was the big winner at the Bafta Film Awards, winning seven prizes in total, including best film, best British film, best director and best cinematography. Joker star Joaquin Phoenix was named best actor, while Renee Zellweger was recognised for her portrayal of Judy Garland. Tap the link in our bio to read more about all of the winners at the 2020 Bafta Film Awards. #Baftas #film #awards #BBCNews

headlines.headline: El colorido encanto del arte callejero chilango 17

features.summary: Adems de sus decenas de museos tradicionales, Ciudad de Mxico es una galera al aire libre de arte callejero, en la que exponen artistas nacionales y extranjeros. Lo invitamos a un recorrido.
